title: Chichén Itzá
subtle:
Informational (nonfiction), 1,747 words, Level Z1 (Grade 5+), Lexile 1130L            
                        
		Multilevel Book also available in levels                     L and U
description: Built by the Maya people over two thousand years so, Chichén Itzá is one of the most visited ruins in Mexico. Students will enjoy reading about how and why these structures were built as well as learning about the fascinating culture of the Maya people.
highFrequencyWords: Use of vocabulary lessons requires a subscription to VocabularyA-Z.com.
